Remarks. Unlike most species of
Macrostomus
,
M. limbipennis
is widespread in the Amazon Basin, with records from Bolivia , Brazil , Ecuador and Peru . The Brazilian specimens are from the western border of the country, bordering the Amazonian environment of the other countries and conspecific with Peruvian specimens.
